resources.string: Idun is known as the goddess of spring and fertility and is known as the \'Rejuvenating One.\' Due to being responsible for the gods\' and goddesses\' immortality, she is also associated with youthfulness. And her most significant symbol is her basket (in some tellings of the story, it is an ashwood box) of golden apples, which she is the guardian of, providing them to all the gods of Asgard.
Please fill both fields to add item.
Click an item to delete from The inventory
